name: People Labs
description:
People Labs, established in 2010, is a reputable organization with a 13-year track record in training, consulting, and recruitment. Renowned as a preferred partner for prominent Indian organizations, we specialize in designing transformative learning interventions that incorporate David Kolb’s ‘Experiential Learning Theory’ at their core. Guided by industry veterans and academic experts, we collaborate closely with our clients to co-create tailored learning modules that address specific performance gaps. 
 With an extensive range of training tools, proficient master trainers, and a strong academic research background, we ensure a dynamic, engaging, and effective learning experience. Over the years, we have successfully conducted more than 900 hours of impactful sessions, benefiting over 47,000 individuals across academic and corporate environments. We take pride in serving over 95 organizations and aspire to positively impact the lives of over 100,000 individuals by 2025.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
